fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, you can choose to anonymously Sentence the player with the most votes if they would be hanged. Instead of dying, they are sent to federal prison, which acts the same as Jailor's jail (protection, roleblocked) except they won't attack the Supreme Justice if they're a role which attacks Jailors (ie: serial killer), and players in federal prison can't talk during the day or vote. Their role is not revealed. They cannot be selected as a target at night for any reason except by you. 3 uses.
- At night, you may choose to Release a player from federal prison, bringing them back into the town. If they're a neutral killing role capable of using their ability on you that night, they immediately do that on you, and if they kill you they clean you as well.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you die, all players in federal prison are executed (unstoppable attack). This does not include players you just released the same night.
